title: Dogs with the most Instagram followers worldwide 2017
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of followers in millions in each Month on the y axis.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions and Manny @manny the frenchie has the lowest Number of followers in millions.
There is a difference of 5.6 between the maximum Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and minimum Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of followers in millions in the y axis.
The Number of followers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and lowest at Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of followers in millions in each Month on the y axis.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions and Manny @manny the frenchie has the lowest Number of followers in millions.
There is a difference of 5.6 between the maximum Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and minimum Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of followers in millions for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Number of followers in millions 6.6 is found at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and the minimum is found at Manny @manny the frenchie where Month is 1.0.
Second maximum Number of followers in millions is found at Month Doug the Pug @itsdougthepug.
The difference of Number of followers in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 5.6.

Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is higher than any other Months with value 6.6, followed by Doug the Pug @itsdougthepug, and Maruto @Marutaro. Down to Month Manny @manny the frenchie with the lowest value 1.0.
Over the past 10 Months, the Number of followers in millions has decreased.
Month Manny @manny the frenchie, and Loki and Bear @Lokistagram have a similar Number of followers in millions that is 1.0.
The average Number of followers in millions in all 10 Months is 2.24.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 22.4.
